dcterms:description: The ACDC MICCAI 2017 challenge dataset consists of 100 patients with 3D cardiac MRI images. Each patient has about 15 volumes covering a full cardiac cycle, and only volumes for the end-diastolic and end-systolic phases are annotated by experts for three structures, including the left ventricle, myocardium, and right ventricle.
dcterms:title: ACDC MICCAI 2017 challenge dataset

dcterms:creator: D. F. Pace
A. V. Dalca
T. Geva
A. J. Powell
M. H. Moghari
P. Golland
dcterms:description: The HVSMR MICCAI 2016 challenge dataset contains 10 3D cardiac MRI images captured in an axial view using a 1.5T scanner with expert annotations of the blood pool and ventricular myocardium.
dcterms:title: HVSMR MICCAI 2016 challenge dataset
